name: Island Loop
description:
Gloomy 2D adventure game.

As a result of the shipwreck, the boy ends up on a mysterious island, and finds himself stuck in a time loop. 

To get off the island, he needs to solve riddles and fix the time. 

Just like our hero, other people also got to the island, but they could not do anything and turned into monsters.

Gameplay

We find a broken watch dial. To fix it, we need to find the parts and connect them in the chapel into a single mechanism. 

Each time we add a piece to the mechanism, the time until the level is reloaded increases. What gives us the quest further. 

When we have collected the entire dial, time will stop resetting and we can get out.

Control:

Go left "A", right "D"
Take something / interaction "E"
